channel.title: Need help with commands so not all of them are admin only?
channel.description:
I put commands on my server cuz there were not (like ::bank ::wildtrain ::saveme... etc..) But they are all admin only? i tried fixing but i get these errors
Compiling scape... client.java:5608: 'else' without 'if' else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("hightrain")) ^ client.java:6384: illegal start of expression public void fromBank(int itemID, int fromSlot, int amount) { ^ 2 errors Press any key to continue . . .
i looks like simplae fix but i havent messed with private servers in awile could someone help please? [br][size=1]Posted on: February 01, 2007, 04:17:58 PM[/size][hr]please help [br][size=1]Posted on: February 01, 2007, 04:56:45 PM[/size][hr]I fixed the 2nd bankerror jus need 1st one :/[br][size=1]Posted on: February 01, 2007, 05:10:09 PM[/size][hr]anyone??

item.title: Need help with commands so not all of them are admin only?
item.dc:creator: @juicy juicy
item.description:
@juicy wrote:

but then all those commands will be admin only :/[br][size=1]Posted on: February 01, 2007, 06:03:29 PM[/size][hr]nvm the only command that wont work is bank but admins can use it?

item.title: Need help with commands so not all of them are admin only?
item.dc:creator: @cheese8 cheese8
item.description:
@cheese8 wrote:

make it so it looks like this:

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“hightrain”))
if(absY >= 3672)
{
sendMessage(“You cannot teleport above level 20 wilderness.”);
}
else
{
teleportToX = 2620;
teleportToY = 3376;
sendMessage(“For experienced fighters.”);
}

Get rid of the:

if(playerRights >= 0) {

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with commands so not all of them are admin only?
item.dc:creator: @juicy juicy
item.description:
@juicy wrote:

////END OF ADMIN COMMANDS////

////Non mod COMMANDS////

   if(playerRights >= 0) {
    else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("hightrain"))
 if(absY >= 3672)
 {
 sendMessage("You cannot teleport above level 20 wilderness.");
 }
 else
{
	teleportToX = 2620;
	teleportToY = 3376;
	sendMessage("For experienced fighters.");
}
